answers.answer: I had alot of dizzy spells when I was in my late teens-early 20's. Does she have anaemia or iron deficiency? Has she been tested for diabetes? I saw an endocronologist and was tested for a whole lot of things including whether I was diabetic or not, or thyroid problems. In the end, I was diagnosed with neurocardiosyncope. Good luck.

question: my 13 year old daughter get dizzy and looses her vision before. I took her to a Cardialogist, Neurologist and pedicatrician. what can i do next? She had done a Cat-Scan, Blood work, EEG, EKG, Please help?
title: teen age dizzy/fainting
